EmailTemplate.name: Cloud Expo Email.cloud expo email
EmailTemplate.subject: See you at Cloud Expo?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
There's a reason 25% of the Fortune 500 use Turbonomic.
SeeÂ us on stand C1424 at Cloud Expo Europe, where we will be serving complementary coffee made fresh by our in-house barista. We will then show you how to manage the trade-offs, between performance, compliance and cost. Book your personal demo now <[[https://calendly.com/graeme-hutchison/demo/03-21-2018?back=1]]>.
If you don't have tickets there is still time to register <[[https://cloudexpo.circdata-solutions.co.uk/rfg/publish/CEEL18/?source=turbonomic]]>
Look forward to seeing you there.
Graeme Hutchison EMEA Marketing Director | Turbonomic
